This website is supplemental material for subscribers of the student magazine, Clavier's Piano Explorer. It includes additional information for students , including links to music mentioned in the issue and quizzes, as well as suggestions for teachers .
Renew Now for Fall: Many subscriptions expire over the summer or in September. Order now for next year, so your students receive their magazines on time and without interruption. Even if you do not know how many students you will have in the fall you can order now. Just place your order for the number of copies you think you will need, and then add a few extras. In September adjust your order number and pay only for the final amount. (We are happy to send a few extra copies in September so new students do not have to wait several weeks for their magazines.)
You can add additional students to your group order throughout the year and only pay for the magazines you receive. (Check your mailing label for expiration date.) Renew now and don't miss an issue. (see below for more information)

Most teachers pass on the low cost of Piano Explorer as a material's fee. At only $6 per student (group subscriptions) for a full year of great magazines, this is less than the cost of a meal at a fast food restaurant. As always we work to keep our costs and thus the price of the magazine as low as possible, especially in this difficult economy.

Group Rate (5 or more copies ): $6 per person/year (10 issues/ year) Regular Rate: $12 per person (1 year)
